thread.title: Road to playoffs can be long, brutal grind _ or rapid ride

title: Road to playoffs can be long, brutal grind _ or rapid ride
text:
> Top News Road to playoffs can be long, brutal grind _ or rapid ride Chicago Cubs manager Joe Maddon, right, reacts with Kyle Schwarber (12) during player introductions before Game 1 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, in St. Louis.
